Oath of Weakness.name: Oath of Weakness
Oath of Weakness.flavor: As you strike your sworn foe, the power of your oath saps its strength and will.
Oath of Weakness.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Sworn Crusade.name: Sworn Crusade
Sworn Crusade.flavor: The holy nimbus representing your oath against an enemy surrounds your allies too, endowing them with deadly accuracy.
Sworn Crusade.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target makes two attack rolls and uses the result he or she prefers when making a melee attack against your oath of enmity target.
